data.name: AmountYouSupply.Title
data.value: The amount of packaging you supply or import

data.name: AmountYouSupply.SingleActivityQuestionTitle
data.value: How much packaging in total did you supply or import in this way, in 2022?

data.name: AmountYouSupply.MultipleActivitiesQuestionTitle
data.value: How much packaging in total did you supply or import in these ways, in 2022?

data.name: AmountYouSupply.SingleActivityParagraph
data.value: Whether you're obligated under EPR for packaging depends on how much packaging you supplied or imported when you:

data.name: AmountYouSupply.MultipleActivitiesParagraph
data.value: Some of the ways you supply or import packaging may make you legally obligated under EPR for packaging. These include:

data.name: AmountYouSupply.Description
data.value: You should calculate the total amount of packaging handled or supplied in these ways across your organisation and its subsidiaries.

data.name: AmountYouSupply.DescriptionAlternate
data.value: You should calculate the total amount of packaging handled or supplied in this way across your organisation and its subsidiaries.

data.name: AmountYouSupply.MultipleActivitiesQuestionError
data.value: Tell us how much packaging in total did you supply or import in these ways, in 2022

data.name: AmountYouSupply.SingleActivityQuestionError
data.value: Tell us how much packaging in total did you supply or importy in this way, in 2022

data.name: AmountYouSupply.DrinksParagraph
data.value: You also told us that you place single-use drinks containers on the market in England, Wales or Northern Ireland. You should include this packaging in your total tonnage.
